con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="loan.services.decision" name="Application" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:plink="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2003/05/partner-link/" xmlns:wsdlsoap11="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:wsdlsoap12="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap12/" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:soap11enc="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/encoding/" xmlns:soap11env="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:soap12env="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-envelope" xmlns:soap12enc="http://www.w3.org/2003/05/soap-encoding" xmlns:wsa="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2003/03/addressing" xmlns:xop="http://www.w3.org/2004/08/xop/include" xmlns:http="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/http/" xmlns:tns="loan.services.decision"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema targetNamespace="loan.services.decision" elementFormDefault="qualified"> <xs:complexType name="make_decision"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="data" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="make_decisionResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="make_decisionResult" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" nillable="true"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:element name="make_decision" type="tns:make_decision"/> <xs:element name="make_decisionResponse" type="tns:make_decisionResponse"/> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="make_decision"> <wsdl:part name="make_decision" element="tns:make_decision"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="make_decisionResponse"> <wsdl:part name="make_decisionResponse" element="tns:make_decisionResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:service name="DecisionService"> <wsdl:port name="Application" binding="tns:Application"> <wsdlsoap11:address location="http://127.0.0.1:8004/DecisionService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> <wsdl:portType name="Application"> <wsdl:operation name="make_decision" parameterOrder="make_decision"> <wsdl:documentation>Receives JSON data and returns loan approval decision.</wsdl:documentation> <wsdl:input name="make_decision" message="tns:make_decision"/> <wsdl:output name="make_decisionResponse" message="tns:make_decisionResponse"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="Application" type="tns:Application"> <wsdlsoap11:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="make_decision"> <wsdlsoap11:operation soapAction="make_decision" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="make_decision"> <wsdlsoap11:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="make_decisionResponse"> <wsdlsoap11:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> </wsdl:definitions>
